item.description:
Hello and Greetings Everyone,

I want to invite you to be my guests at this amazing workshop that is happening.

It is called Mysticism and the Mystical Life.

Mystical refers to " a spiritual reality not apparent to the senses or intelligence... stemming from direct communion with God." This means that the mystic is in a loving relationship with the God at the center of his/her being and finds complete peace, joy, light and love in that holy place within. This is a deep and profound experience of God that is available to anyone. Join us to learn more about awakening this true love.


It will take place at 10am and go until about 1:30 with luch provided.
Cost is $30
if you are from this meet up the cost will be $20

Hope to see you there.

In Light
Rev Gabrielle
item.name: Mysticism and the Mystical Life
